name: The Gift of Sentience (Michael Anderson)
description:
The Gift of Sentience is a 3D platformer in which you must stack your way to victory. Enjoy exploring the 4 level handcrafted environment and overcoming each challenge in your way. 

W,A,S,D to move.

Space to jump.

ESC for options once IN THE GAME

R TO RESTART FROM CURRENT CHECKPOINT AT ANY TIME.

This game was made in 3 days for the Brackeys game jam 10 by Super Salte Games, a small  4 person team co-founded by me and some friends. We made all of the assets from scratch including 3D models, sounds design, and all code used is original.  

The only external product we used were some 3D assets which can be found here:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/fantasy/polygon-knights-pa...

And a skybox which can be found here:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/farland-skies-cl...

I worked as  The Lead Level Designer and Environment builder meaning I built up the world, piece by piece and designed each gameplay beat. I also did a bit of programing and systems building. I built the stacking mechanic as well as did a majority of the sound programming.

I hope you enjoy!
